videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure and exposure compensation (-2.0 - +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
speed: 1/1500 - 1 s 1/4000 - 1/120 s (Continuous H: 120 fps) 1/4000 - 1/60 s (Continuous H: 60 fps) 4 s (Fireworks show scene mode)
monitor: 7.5 cm (3-in.), approx. 614k-dot, wide viewing angle OLED monitor with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment
media: Internal memory (approx. 65 MB) SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12 (included) AC Adapter EH-62F (available separately)
aperture: Electronically-controlled ND filter (-2 AV) selection mode
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 110.1 x 60.3 x 30.7 mm (4.4 x 2.4 x 1.3 in.) (excluding projections)
focallength: 4.5-81.0 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 25-450 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 1.5 m (5 ft) to infinity Macro mode: Approx. 1 cm (0.4 in.) (at a wide-angle zoom position) to infinity (All distances measured from center of front surface of lens)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG 3D images: MPO Sound files (voice memo): WAV Movies: MOV (Video: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, Audio: AAC stereo)
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CMOS; approx. 18.91 million total pixels
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 1800 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
isosensitivitystandardoutputsensitivity: ISO 125-1600 ISO 3200 (available when using Auto mode)
